Description: Body sherd (mended from two fragments) of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black, with part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres; exterior: part of a sphinx’s head, to left.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 288, no. 853)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1039) (phase 2)
